synopsis.text: Zeroâ€™s nefarious plans. Set against the backdrop of the 1930s, this thrilling anime takes viewers on a whirlwind tour of the globe, with each episode unfolding in a new and exciting location. With a perfect blend of adventure, comedy, and action, "Montana Jones" promises to keep you on the edge of your seat as our heroes race against time to uncover the world's hidden treasures and protect them from falling into the wrong hands. Will Montana, Alfred, and Melissa succeed in their quest, or will Lord Zero and his henchmen triumph? Join the adventure and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
